resources.string: This is the icon for the History list
This app requires bluetooth to be on. Please enable

Hi there! I hope you\'ve enjoyed your day here at Cardiff and that this application has been of some help to you. I\'d like to thank you for helping me out with my dissertation, the data you\'ve generated for me today will form the groundwork for an exciting investigation into Beacon technology in the entertainment industry. I have one last request for you, would you mind completing the survey below? Should only take a minute and will provide me with fantastic primary research. Please could you rate each question from 1 to 5
Hi there! thanks for your help today! Please fill in the survey below.
